name: new_dependency_commit
description: Identifies commits that introduced a new dependency on a third-party library by analyzing commit messages or changes in dependency files like package.json.

dimensions.name: oid
dimensions.description: The unique identifier for the commit.

dimensions.name: message_headline
dimensions.description: The headline of the commit message.

dimensions.name: committed_date
dimensions.description: The date and time when the commit was made.

measures.name: new_dependency_count
measures.description: Counts the number of new dependencies introduced in a commit.

sample_questions: Which commit introduced a new dependency on a third-party library?
How many new dependencies were added in a specific commit?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT oid, message_headline, committed_date FROM commits.commits WHERE message_headline LIKE '%add dependency%' OR message LIKE '%add dependency%' OR message LIKE '%package.json%' OR message LIKE '%dependency management%'
